definition: having or revealing supreme mastery or skill, someone who is exceptionally skilled in any field
details:
adjective
- having or revealing supreme mastery or skill
= example: having or revealing supreme mastery or skill
noun
- someone who is exceptionally skilled in any field
= example: someone who is exceptionally skilled in any field
- a musician who is a consummate master of technique and artistry
= example: a musician who is a consummate master of technique and artistry
